title: Client wont Launch
body:
So, i accidently closed the patching message that popped up when i opened the client for the first time. and when i tried to re-open it...it wont launch. No matter how many times i click the "LAUNCH" button, it wont open the client....Please help?


and yes, i restarted my computer, checked for windows update, used the repair option, opened it as an administrator, updated drivers. everything...and its still stuck.

replies.body:
This is often caused by an *unstable connection* to the login servers, so I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). This guide addresses the most common local network settings that conflict with League and cause these types of issues.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
